javadoc:
Component that has a table to show pathnames; the panel includes buttons to control
 the order of the paths, and to add and remove paths. The add button brings up a
 file chooser. Call the setFileChooser() method to control how the file chooser should
 behave.  If the table entries should not be edited, call setEditingEnabled(false).

methods.name: <init>

params.name: paths
params.comment: list of paths to show; may be null

params.name: enableEdits
params.comment: true if edits should be allowed

params.name: addToTop
params.comment:
true if new paths are to be added to the top of the table, false
 if new paths are to be added to the end of the table

methods.name: <init>
methods.comment: Construct a new PathnameTablePanel will a reset button

params.name: paths
params.comment: list of paths to show; may be null

params.name: enableEdits
params.comment: true if edits should be allowed

params.name: addToTop
params.comment: true if new paths are to be added to the top of the table, false

params.name: resetCallback
params.comment:
Callback containing the action to perform if the reset button is pressed
 if new paths are to be added to the end of the table

methods.name: setFileChooserProperties
methods.comment: Set properties on the file chooser that is displayed when the "Add" button is pressed.

params.name: preferenceForLastSelectedDir
params.comment:
Preference to use as the current directory in the
 file chooser

params.name: selectionMode
params.comment: mode defined in GhidraFileFilter, e.g., GhidraFileFilter.FILES_ONLY

params.name: allowMultiSelection
params.comment: true if multiple files can be selected

params.name: filter
params.comment: filter to use; may be null if no filtering is required

methods.javadoc:
Set whether the entries in the table can be edited.
@param enableEdits false means to not allow editing; the table is editable by default.
methods.name: setEditingEnabled
methods.comment: Set whether the entries in the table can be edited.

params.name: enableEdits
params.comment: false means to not allow editing; the table is editable by default.

methods.name: setAddToTop
methods.comment:
Set whether new paths should be added to the top of the table (true) or at the end of
 the table (false).

params.name: addToTop
params.comment: true means to add to the top of the table

methods.javadoc: Get the table in this path name panel.
methods.name: getTable
methods.comment: Get the table in this path name panel.

methods.javadoc: Clear the paths in the table.
methods.name: clear
methods.comment: Clear the paths in the table.

name: PathnameTablePanel
comment:
Component that has a table to show pathnames; the panel includes buttons to control
 the order of the paths, and to add and remove paths. The add button brings up a
 file chooser. Call the setFileChooser() method to control how the file chooser should
 behave.  If the table entries should not be edited, call setEditingEnabled(false).
